description: This dataset contains examples of alternate uses for a lightbulb.

examples.text: Put it inside of a balloon to make it glow.
you break the glass then it's a spring
a surprising use for a lightbulb could be a small and thin bowl.

Use the inner part of it and attach it to something like a lunch pail or something and find a way to power it. Then the light will produce light energy and heat to keep your food warm and make it easier to find things. then you can use the glass to cover the lower part to cover the food so you don't burn your hand getting it.
you can use it for a solar system
throw it up and catch it
Use it in case of an emergency
a lightbulb could be used as something like the sun but for an animal you could use it to keep an animal hot even if a lightbulb or always known for their heat
To put it on a tree and when it’s nighttime it would light up if you don’t have streetlights.
To make a really cool night light
